Sentence.sentence: a basis for explaining human genetic diversityan aid to understanding different populationsan explanation for social and cultural differencesa term to describe individual human characteristicsmodern genetics research is likely to fuel racial conflictsrace is a poorly defined marker of human genetic diversityrace as a biological term can explain human genetic diversitygenetics research should consider social and cultural variablesit is absolutely necessary to put race aside in making diagnosisit is important to include social variables in genetics researchracial categories for genetic diversity could lead to wrong clinical predictionsdiscrimination against black people may cause negligence in clinical treatmentThey be more precise with the language they use.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: While we argue phasing out racial terminology ( ' ,  术语 ) in the biological sciences, we also acknowledge that  using race as a political or social category to study racism, although filled with lots of challenges, remains necessary  given  our  need  to  understand  how  structural  inequities  and  discrimination  produce  health  disparities  ( ' ,  差异 )  between groups, Yudell said.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: One analyst suggests it is necessary to accept both the positive and negative aspects of innovative products.

Sentence.sentence: Throughout these series, you will learn more about the profession, the necessary steps to get a social work degree, the rich history of social work and many ways that social workers help others.

Sentence.sentence: And we create opportunity for assessment and intervention, to help clients and communities cope effectively with the reality and change that reality when necessary.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"必不可少的，必需的"之意。
means: indispensable ： 语气强，侧重指绝对必要性或不可缺少性。
essential ： 指对事物本身性质具有决定性的重要性，暗含不可缺少，否则便无法存在。
necessary ： 最常用词，侧重由客观因素决定的某种需要，强调不可避免，但并非绝不可缺少。
requisite ： 正式用词，特指为实现某一目的或得到某种结果而应有的需要，有时可与necessary换用。

stems_affixes.word_buile: access[n.接近;入口 v.存取, 接近]+ible能……的→adj.能接近的;可进去的
access接近+ory表形容词或名词→接近的物→附加物,附属的
excess[n.过度,过剩]+ive……的→adj.过分的;过度的
in不+accessible[adj.能接近的;可进去的]→adj.难以接近的
suc随后+cess行走,前进+ive……的→随后跟上→连续的
access接近+ory表形容词或名词→接近的物→附加物,附属的
an=ante前+cest=cess行走,前进+or人→走在前面的人→祖先
an=ante前+cest=cess行走,前进+ry整体→n.祖先;世系,家世
con共同+cess后退+ion动作或状态→n.让步;退位
ne=need需要+cess行走,前进+ary物→n.必需品

stems_affixes.value_cn: 必要性, 需要,必需品
stems_affixes.word_buile: ne=need需要+cess行走,前进+ity性质,特性等→n.必要性, 需要,必需品
process[n.过程;进行 v.加工, 处理]+ion表名词→向前走的队伍
re回+cess行走,前进→走回去→休息
re回+cess行走,前进+ion动作或状态→走回去→撤退
suc随后+cess行走,前进→随后跟上→继续→继续做→成功

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接连发生,继承, 继任
stems_affixes.word_buile: suc随后+cess行走,前进+ion动作或状态→随后跟上→继续发生→继续别人[事业,成功]→继承, 继任

Sentence.sentence: A school boy or girl is unpunctual because he or she does not have the necessary human virtue of self-discipline.

sentences.en: It took me a year to get the necessary materials together.
sentences.cn: 我花了一年的时间才把所需要的资料组织好。

sentences.en: It is necessary that one should obey the law.
sentences.cn: 一个人遵守法律是必要的。

means.word_mean: 必然的; 不可避免的

sentences.en: Because the company was doing more business it was necessary to expand the factory.
sentences.cn: 由于公司业务的扩大, 扩大工厂是必然的。

means.word_mean: 迫不得已的，非做不行的，非自愿的，不自由的

sentence.cn: 现在当地居民不得不平衡他们传统的生活方式与现代法国的生活方式，但随之而来的不仅是国家福利，还会有酗酒、背叛甚至是自杀。
sentence.en: These local citizens now have to balance their traditional self-supporting hunting lifestyle with the lifestyle offered by the modern french republic,  which brings with it not only necessary state welfare,  but also alcoholism,  betrayal and even suicide
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

jx.jx_en_mean: something that is undesirable but must be accepted
jx.jx_cn_mean: 无法避免的坏事；不得已的事

entry.def: Something that is necessary is needed in order for something else to happen.

example.ex: I kept the engine running because it might be necessary to leave fast...
example.tran: 我没让发动机熄火，因为也许需要迅速离开。

example.ex: We will do whatever is necessary to stop them...
example.tran: 我们要采取一切必要措施去阻止他们。

entry.def: A necessary consequence or connection must happen or exist, because of the nature of the things or events involved.

example.ex: Wastage was no doubt a necessary consequence of war...
example.tran: 巨大的损耗无疑是战争的必然结果。

example.ex: Scientific work is differentiated from art by its necessary connection with the idea of progress.
example.tran: 科学工作与艺术的区别在于它与人类进步有着必然联系。

entry.def: Necessaries are things, such as food or clothing, that you need to have in order to live.

example.ex: ...a small parcel of necessaries tied up in a handkerchief and carried on a stick.
example.tran: 用手绢包好挑在棍子上的一小包生活必需品

entry.def: If you say that something will happen if necessary ,when necessary, or where necessary, you mean that it will happen if it is necessary, when it is necessary, or where it is necessary.

example.ex: If necessary, the airship can stay up there for days to keep out of danger...
example.tran: 必要时，飞艇能在那里停留数天以躲避危险。

example.ex: The army needs men who are willing to fight, when necessary...
example.tran: 军队需要在必要时愿意投入战斗的军人。

sentences.sentence: "food and shelter are necessities of life"
"allow farmers to buy their requirements under favorable conditions"
"a place where the requisites of water fuel and fodder can be obtained"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English; from Latin necessarius, from necesse 'needful'

sentences.en: Only use your car when absolutely necessary.

sentences.cn: 这是发展的必然后果。
sentences.en: This is a necessary consequence of progress.

sentences.en: This place is rather cramped.

sentences.cn: 他们总是随时总结经验, 所以工作质量提高很快.
sentences.en: They always sum up their ( work ) experience whenever it is necessary, so they improve rapidly.

sentences.cn: 他不擅航海, 所以当他从一码头驶到另一码头时,得一直沿海岸线航行.
sentences.en: He wasn't good navigator, so it is necessary that the coastline remain in sight as he moved from one harbor to the next.

sentences.en: He believed that in building socialism it was necessary to make thorough plans on behalf of the state.

sentences.cn: 领导应和群众经常见面.
sentences.en: It's necessary for leading cadres to keep frequent contacts with the masses.

sentences.cn: 我们有必要用网盖上红醋栗树.
sentences.en: It's necessary for us to net the currant bushes.

sentences.en: It is both important and necessary to note this difference.

sentences.cn: 这就使得工农业必须飞速发展.
sentences.en: This has made it necessary for agriculture and industry to develop very quickly.

sentences.en: Is it necessary to send a car for them?

sentences.cn: 总之, 英语课堂上适当使用体态语来辅助教学是必要的.

sentences.cn: 我们已采取必要的防火措施.

sentences.cn: 然而,我只有一句话要说: 这声音是必要的.

sentences.cn: 日本政府声称战争是必然的,这说法显然是错误的.
sentences.en: The Japanese government's claim that war was necessary was clearly mistaken.

sentences.cn: 规律是事物发展变化的内在的本质的必然的联系.
sentences.en: Rule is the inherence and necessary relationship of development and changes of things.

sentences.cn: 死亡是生命必然的终结.
sentences.en: Death is the necessary end of life.

sentences.en: Logic in general: contains absolutely necessary rules of thought.

sentences.cn: 对传统继承是必要的, 也是必然的.
sentences.en: Inheriting to tradition is necessary, is also inevitable.

sentences.cn: 发问者: 那冲突是必然的了? 毕竟, 那也许就是事物的自然规律.
sentences.en: Questioner: Is conflict necessary then? It may perhaps, after all, be the natural order of things.

sentences.cn: 必然的: 其中肯定或者否定被视为必然的判断.
sentences.en: Apodeictic : affirmation or negation is taken as necessary.

sentences.cn: 由于公司业务的扩大,扩大工厂是必然的.

sentences.cn: 为了更好的享受完整的生活,平衡好两者的关系是必然的明智的选择.

sentences.cn: 想象力是一种创造的力量即必然的发明一些新的机器.

sentences.cn: 政府声称战争是必然的,这说法显然是错误的.

sentences.cn: 但是,进化不得不做这项工作, 因此,进化为我们发展了必然的复杂化.
sentences.en: But evolution had to do it, so it has developed the necessary sophistication for us.

sentences.cn: 因此, 改善国家的区域发展战略、优化区域金融结构是必然的选择.

sentences.cn: 教育上的花费是积极的好事, 不是必然的祸害.

sentences.cn: 从远古时代, 是一个结出必要的, 不可避免的行为.

sentences.cn: 无疑地, 罪犯是社会不可避免的一种人.

sentences.cn: 他有足够的钱购买生活必需品

sentences.cn: 人们缺少生活必需品.

sentences.cn: 鞋是人们的日常生活必需品.

sentences.cn: 梦想是生命的必需品.
sentences.en: Dreams are necessary to life.

sentences.cn: 我们的收入只能购买最起码的生活必需品.
sentences.en: Our income allows only the necessaries of life.

sentences.en: Necessaries are goods and services suitable to the condition in life of a minor.

sentences.cn: 乳制品是人民生活必需品.
sentences.en: Dairy produce is people necessaries of life.

sentences.cn: 在富有社会,奢侈品和必需品之间没有显著差别.
sentences.en: In the affluent society no useful distinction be made between luxuries and necessaries.

sentences.cn: 那时很多生活必需品我们只好不用.
sentences.en: We had to go without many necessaries.

sentences.cn: 对她来说，书就像面包一样，是生活必需品。
